input: Identify the correct sequence of passing a Budget in the Parliament

options.A: Vote on Account, Finance Bill, Appropriation Bill Discussion on Budget
options.B: Finance Bill, Appropriation Bill, Discussion on Budget, Vote on Accounts
options.C: Discussion on Budget, Vote on Account, Finance Bill, Appropriation Bill
options.D: Discussion on Budget, Appropriation Bill, Finance Bill, Vote on Account

explanation: The correct sequence is, Discussion on Budget, Appropriation Bill, Finance Bill, Vote on Account.
